name: insomnia-plugin-shawithrsa
description: An Insomnia plugin for generating digital signatures using various SHA hash algorithms (SHA1, SHA224, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512) with RSA
author: Pandu Dwi Putra Nugroho

insomnia.name: shaWithRSA
insomnia.displayName: Generate Signature with SHA and RSA
insomnia.description: An Insomnia plugin for generating digital signatures using various SHA hash algorithms (SHA1, SHA224, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512) with RSA
